summary: An email from a U.S. Attorney's Office Paralegal Specialist to an FBI Special Agent, coordinating the handoff of a drive containing material for the Ghislaine Maxwell case. It shows ongoing evidence handling between law enforcement agencies during Maxwell's prosecution.

persons.name: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The intended recipient of the email, being asked to coordinate receiving a drive containing material for the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist U.S. Attorney's Office
persons.context: The sender of the email, reaching out to coordinate the handoff of a drive with evidence or material related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.person2: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office
connections.description: Coordinating the transfer of evidence (a drive) related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI.

events.title: Coordination for Maxwell evidence transfer
events.description: A paralegal specialist from the U.S. Attorney's Office emails an FBI Special Agent to arrange receiving a drive containing material for the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
personsInvolved: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office

locations: 1 Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The email coordinates the handoff of a physical drive containing 'stuff for Maxwell,' indicating ongoing evidence handling in her case in June 2021.
The communication is between a U.S. Attorney's Office paralegal and an FBI Special Agent, showing inter-agency collaboration.
The meeting was proposed to occur at '1SA' (likely 1 Saint Andrew's Plaza, the SDNY office) on the afternoon of June 4, 2021.
